title: email from field
content: I am running TB 113.0.2 and as of the last couple weeks when I go to compose a message from my main account the from field comes up with another accounts email address. I've done all the account setting/outgoing server rebuilds and made sure the user name and description fields are the same. I've checked in the individual accounts in the outgoing server settings. What next? I've deleted the account in outgoing server and added it back. Nothing seems to work. Never had this problem before. I would say it's been going on for about 2-3 weeks. Took me a while to discover it.
creator: 300perkins

title: Unwanted Addition
content: I am using Thunderbird version 102.11.1 64bit using POP with a Gmail Account. Ocassionally, I have to use Gmail in my Edge browser to send or reply to a message, only to find it appears in Thunderbird.
creator: 5togdoova21
